welcomeMessage: Welcome to the Duplicate Finder application!

instructions.step1: Select the folders you want to scan for duplicates.
instructions.step2: Click on the 'Scan' button to start the scanning process.
instructions.step3: Review the results and take action as needed.

errors.folderNotSelected: Please select at least one folder to scan.
errors.scanFailed: An error occurred while scanning. Please try again.

footer: Thank you for using Duplicate Finder!
